abstract: Joseph C. Lewis, the British billionaire who was once the largest shareholder in the auction house Christie’s, has built up a big stake in another well-known company: Bear Stearns.
lead_paragraph: Joseph C. Lewis, the British billionaire who was once the largest shareholder in the auction house Christie’s, has built up a big stake in another well-known company: Bear Stearns.

headline.main: British Billionaire Takes Bear Stearns Stake
